#summary Wicket components for including JW Player into your page

= Introduction =
This module defines a Wicket wrapper for the [http://www.longtailvideo.com/support/jw-player JW Player] Flash & HTML5 audio and video player.


= Dependencies = 

  * [CwmBase cwm-base]

= Details =

The JWPlayer is free for non-commercial use only.  An alternative media player can be defined if your server is not using the JWPlayer.
